metadata.name: Uncommon Child Process Of AddinUtil.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects uncommon child processes of the Add-In deployment cache updating utility (AddInutil.exe) which could be a sign of potential abuse of the binary to proxy execution via a custom Addins.Store payload.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\addinutil.exe')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\conhost.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\werfault.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\syswow64\\werfault.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects uncommon child processes of the Add-In deployment cache updating utility (AddInutil.exe) which could be a sign of potential abuse of the binary to proxy execution via a custom Addins.Store payload.
